name: 3D Platformer Final (jack1682)
description:
This is my 3D Platformer Project

Modifications:

  • Updated level 2 to have a unique setting
  • Created level 3
  • Created boss level (or level 4)
  • Utilized jump pads in some of the newly created levels 
  • Changed main menu’s name
  • Added buttons to level select
  • Added more to the about tab of the menu
  • Altered complete player’s camera view mildly
  • Updated goal pickups to move into their subsequent levels
  • Increased the height of the walls in level 3 using ProBuilder
  • Created two boss enemies in level 4 by upping the scale, damage, and heath of the ground chaser enemies 
  • Changed the text that shows up upon finishing level 4
  • removed next level button from the level four victory page

Credits:

Created by Tre Jackson
